amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that each State has a process in place to receive and review student complaints and to promote good practices and address abuses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-404 to retain the requirement that states have a process to hear and take appropriate action on student complaints regarding institutions as part of the state authorization.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 247 (Roll no. 75).
